meanings.definition: The quality or state of being able to be formed or shaped.
meanings.sent1: The clay's formabilities allowed it to be easily molded into different shapes.
meanings.sent2: Artists often appreciate the formabilities of clay for creating sculptures.
meanings.sent3: The formabilities of the playdough made it a hit at the children's party.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity had the formabilities of a sculptor, shaping ideas into beautiful art.
meanings.sent5: The formabilities of the material were evident as it transformed from a flat sheet into a 3D model.

meanings.definition: The ability to be molded or transformed.
meanings.sent1: The plastic's formabilities made it ideal for creating custom molds.
meanings.sent2: The formabilities of the dough allowed it to take on various shapes.
meanings.sent3: The formabilities of the cookie dough surprised the baker with its versatility.
meanings.sent4: Her formabilities in adapting to new situations were truly impressive.
meanings.sent5: The formabilities of the fabric were showcased as it seamlessly draped over the mannequin.
